item.description: Products Are all the products naturally dyed and handwoven? Yes. Are these products available in Desi stores as well? Some of these are available only here, some are available in Desi stores as well.

item.title: Wash Care Instructions
item.description: Natural dyed fabrics need special care owing to the properties of the dyes. Try to follow the below instructions while washingyour naturallydyed handwovenproduct formaximumlifeanddurabilityoffabric:
